message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for you at $1500000. Considering its immense worth and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending a special offer to you. I propose purchasing this product for $1400000. This represents a substantial saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
